mapper.sql: id, hostName, systemNetCardsBandMacAddress, systemNetCardsBandDevice, systemNetCardsBandWidth, systemNetCardsReceiveBytesPs, systemNetCardsReceiveBytesPsMin, systemNetCardsReceiveBytesPsMax, systemNetCardsReceiveBytesPsMean, systemNetCardsReceiveBytesPsStd, systemNetCardsReceiveBytesPs55Quantile, systemNetCardsReceiveBytesPs75Quantile, systemNetCardsReceiveBytesPs95Quantile, systemNetCardsReceiveBytesPs99Quantile, systemNetCardsSendBytesPs, systemNetCardsSendBytesPsMin, systemNetCardsSendBytesPsMax, systemNetCardsSendBytesPsMean, systemNetCardsSendBytesPsStd, systemNetCardsSendBytesPs55Quantile, systemNetCardsSendBytesPs75Quantile, systemNetCardsSendBytesPs95Quantile, systemNetCardsSendBytesPs99Quantile, heartbeatTime, heartbeatTimeMinute, heartbeatTimeHour
mapper.select: SELECT t1.*, t2.systemNetCardsBandMacAddress as 'macAddress', t2.systemNetCardsBandDevice as 'device' FROM (select ${function}(${fieldName}) as 'last', heartbeatTimeMinute from tb_metrics_net_card where hostName = #{hostName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and systemNetCardsBandMacAddress = #{macAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and heartbeatTime >= #{startTime} and heartbeatTime <= #{endTime} group by heartbeatTimeMinute) as t1 LEFT JOIN tb_metrics_net_card as t2 ON t2.heartbeatTimeMinute = t1.heartbeatTimeMinute AND t2.hostName = #{hostName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND t2.systemNetCardsBandMacAddress = #{macAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT t1.*, t2.systemNetCardsBandMacAddress as 'macAddress', t2.systemNetCardsBandDevice as 'device' FROM (select ${function}(${fieldName}) as 'last', ${function}(${fieldName}Min) as 'min', ${function}(${fieldName}Max) as 'max', ${function}(${fieldName}Mean) as 'mean', ${function}(${fieldName}Std) as 'std', ${function}(${fieldName}55Quantile) as 'fiftyFiveQuantile', ${function}(${fieldName}75Quantile) as 'seventyFiveQuantile', ${function}(${fieldName}95Quantile) as 'ninetyFiveQuantile', ${function}(${fieldName}99Quantile) as 'ninetyNineQuantile', heartbeatTimeMinute from tb_metrics_net_card where hostName = #{hostName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and systemNetCardsBandMacAddress = #{macAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and heartbeatTime >= #{startTime} and heartbeatTime <= #{endTime} group by heartbeatTimeMinute) as t1 LEFT JOIN tb_metrics_net_card as t2 ON t2.heartbeatTimeMinute = t1.heartbeatTimeMinute AND t2.hostName = #{hostName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND t2.systemNetCardsBandMacAddress = #{macAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into tb_metrics_net_card (id, hostName, systemNetCardsBandMacAddress, systemNetCardsBandDevice, systemNetCardsBandWidth, systemNetCardsReceiveBytesPs, systemNetCardsSendBytesPsMax, systemNetCardsSendBytesPsMean, systemNetCardsSendBytesPsStd, systemNetCardsSendBytesPs55Quantile, systemNetCardsSendBytesPs75Quantile, systemNetCardsSendBytesPs95Quantile, systemNetCardsSendBytesPs99Quantile, heartbeatTime, heartbeatTimeMinute, heartbeatTimeHour ) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{hostname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
